name: Cage
description: Place Cage on any Creature. As long as Cage remains on a tile that tile is considered out of play. (2)

name: Dog
description: Dog

name: Effortless Pounce
description: Choose a Tiger you control. This Tiger may be added as an ally for this BATTLE even if it does not neighbor the Defender.

name: Elementary
description: Add together the INT values of all Dogs you control. Divide this number by 6 to find X. This tile is now worth X points. Place this tile in your point pile. (4)

name: Extinction
description: You may only play Extinction if you have 3 or more different Creature clases in play. Choose a Creature class. Discard all Creatures of that class in play. (1)

name: Gallop
description: Move a Horse you control up to 3 empty spaces in a straight line.

name: Golden Bone
description: If you have a Dog in play place Golden Bone in your point pile. It has a value of 1 point. As an Action, any player who controls a Dog or Dragon and who does not have a Golden Bone in their point pile, may move Golden Bone(s) to their point pile. (4)

name: Happy Tiger
description: Must replace a Tiger. All Creatures are compatible with Happy Tiger and Happy Tiger is compatible with all Creatures.

name: It's Only A Bunny
description: If a Rabbit you control has no allies and is a Defender, no new tiles can be added to this stack. Discard all tiles below. Capture the Attacker and all its allies.

name: Lasso
description: Choose a Horse from an opponent's point or discard pile. Place that Horse into your point pile.

name: Lightning
description: Choose a tile to have -2 STR for the rest fo the turn. (2)

name: Loud Bark
description: Chooe a Creature neighboring a Dog you control. Have its controller move the creature one space into an empty one. Capture the Creature if its controller can not do this.

name: Meteor
description: If you have any points, Meteor will cost you 1 to play. Choose a space. Discard all tiles in that space. Place Meteor in that space. While in play Meteor is considered an Obstacle. (2)

name: Neigh
description: If you control a Horse, choose a player to make a horse sound. If the chosen player makes the sound to your satisfaction, place Neigh into their point pile. Neigh is worth 1 point. (2)

name: No Escape
description: Play on a BATTLE Action stack in which a Tiger you control is an Attacker or attacking ally. Discard all Action/Reaction and Reaction tiles below this tile. Opponents may no longer add tiles to this BATTLE Action stack.

name: Omnivorous
description: Discard a tile neighboring a Pig you control. (2)

name: Oof
description: Discard a Ram you control from the playing area. Choose an opponent. Randomly select half the tiles (rounded up) in their hand. Discard those tiles. (2)

name: Pig
description: Pig

name: Powerful Kick
description: Move a tile neighboring a Horse you control back 2 spaces. If moving the tile causes other tiles to be moved, move the other tiles back as well.

name: Push
description: Move a Ram you control to the left or right 1, 2, or 3 spaces. If there are tiles in the Ram's path, push those along as the Ram moves.

name: Rabbit Habit
description: If a Rabbit you control has a Rabbit neighbor, draw 3 tiles. Reveal all tiles drawn this way. If any Rabbits are drawn place them into play. Discard the other drawn tiles. (3)

name: Rabbit Hole
description: As a Reaction, you may place a Rabbit you control under this tile. As an Action, you may take a Rabbit from under this tile and place it into any empty space. If this tile is discarded from the playing area, discard all Rabbits in the hole.

name: Rabbit Leap
description: Choose a Rabbit you control. That Rabbit may leap in a straight line over 1, 2 ,or 3 tiles or spaces into an empty space.

name: Rabbit
description: Rabbit

name: Ram
description: Ram

name: Silly Accident
description: Discard a Creature in play with an INT 3 or less. (2)

name: Snuggle Party
description: Choose a Rabbit you control. You now control all Creatures neighboring that Rabbit as long as those Creatures remain neighbors to the Rabbit. (2)

name: Tiger Frenzy
description: Discard all Creatures neighboring each Tiger you control. (3)

name: Tiger Totem
description: Your Tigers do not need a BATTLE Action tile to start a BATTLE.

name: Tiger
description: Tiger

name: Waddle
description: You may move a Pig you control over 1 space into an empty space.

name: When Pigs Fly
description: Move half (rounded down) of the Pigs you control to new, empty spaces. (2)

name: Wooden Horse
description: As an Action, you may replace one Wooden Horse with a Horse.

name: Banana Barrage
description: Each Monkey you control may choose a tile that does not neighbor it to give -1 STR to until the end of turn. (2)

name: Biased Judgement
description: If you have taken no previous actions this turn and there is an even number of Rats in the playing area, this tile is worth half that number in points. Otherwise it is worth no points. Place this tile in your Point Pile if it is worth any points. End the turn. (2)

name: Constrict
description: For each Snake you control choose a tile at random from an opponent's hand. Discard all chosen tiles.

name: Contagion
description: Place under a Creature neighboring a Rat you control. At the end of each turn, discard any tile that began the turn with a Contagion under it. The controller of the discarded tile then moves Contagion to a non-Rat Creature that neighbored the discarded tile. Discard Contagion if it can not be moved in this manner. (2)

name: Crow Blast
description: Discard 2 Roosters you control. Discard all tiles below this tile. The BATTLE is over and you decide who wins the BATTLE. (3)

name: Diamond Rooster Totem
description: Roosters you control can not be chosen to be the Defender in a BATTLE. (2)

name: Dragon
description: Dragon

name: Dragon's Hoard
description: Play into an empty space neighboring a Dragon you control. Then discard all Dragons neighboring Dragon's Hoard. If Dragon's Hoard is defeated in a BATTLE place it in the attacking player's Point Pile. It is worth 4 points. (1)

name: Egg Pelt
description: Choose 2 tiles you control in the playing with the word 'Egg' in their Tile Name. Discard them. If you do so, after this turn, immediately take another turn. (1)

name: Explosive Egg
description: Place into an empty space neighboring a Rooster you control. That space is still considered empty and unoccupied. If a tile is about to be placed in that space discard it along with this Item. (3)

name: Golden Egg
description: Play only if you control a Rooser. As an Action place this in your Point Pile from the playing area. It has a value of 2 points. As an Action a player controlling a Dragon or a Rooster may move this tile from one Point Pile to another. (2)

name: Happy Rooster
description: All Creatures are compatible with Happy Rooster and Happy Rooster is compatible with all Creatures. (1)

name: Hypnotic Glare
description: Place under a Creature neighboring a Snake you control. The Creature has 1 STR / 0 INT for as long as this tile is under the Creature. Discard this tile if the Creature no longer neighbors the Snake. (2)

name: Impervious
description: Choose an Ox you control. If that Ox is removed from the playing area this turn, return it to the space it was removed from at the end of the turn. Discard any tiles occupying that space when the Ox returns. (2)

name: Leader of the Pack
description: Place this tile under a Rat you control. When this tile is under a Rat that Rat gains +1 STR / +1 INT for each other Rat you control. It also gains: As an Action this Rat may move 1 space into an empty space. (1)

name: Mind Control
description: Choose a Creature you do no control in the playing area. You control the Creature for the rest of the turn. As long as you control the Creature, it gains: As an Action this creature may move up to 4 empty spaces. (1)

name: Monkey Swing
description: If played as an Action a Monkey you control may 'swing' up and over 2 spaces into an empty space. If played as a Reaction it may 'swing' up and over 1 space into an empty space.

name: Monkey
description: Monkey

name: Mosey On
description: Move up to 3 Ox you control each 1 space into an empty space.

name: Ox
description: Ox

name: Pull
description: Move an Ox you control in a straight line left, right, up, or down 1, 2, or 3 spaces into empty spaces. If there are tiles behind the Ox, you may pull those tiles along as well.

name: Rat
description: Rat

name: Rattle
description: Move a Creature neighboring a Snake you control back away from the Snake 1 space into an empty  space. If the Creature can not do this, subtract the value of the Snake's STR from the Creature's STR until the end of turn.

name: Reversal of Fortune
description: For this BATTLE, if the Defender is a Creature, the side with the lowest STR and INT wins. (3)

name: Revive
description: At the end of the turn you may take a Creature from your Discard Pile and put it in your hand instead of drawing a tile from a Draw Stack. If playing Revive is the only thing you do on your turn, you may take 2. (1)

name: Rooster
description: Rooster

name: Sapphire Monkey Totem
description: All Monkeys you control that become part of a compatible square completed by your opponent are not removed from the playing area. (2)

name: Sewer System
description: X = THE INT VALUE OF ALL RATS NEIGHBORING THIS TILE. As an Action or Reaction, you may move a Rat you control to an empty space neighboring a Sewer System. If Sewer System is ever discarded from the playing area, discard all Rats neighboring it as well. (3)

name: Slither
description: Move a Snake you contorl 1 space into an empty space. You may then choose a Creature neigboring the Snake to have 1 INT until the end of the turn. (3)

name: Snake
description: Snake

name: Stampede
description: If there is a chain of 3 or more Ox connected as neighbors, choose an Ox you control in that chain. Move the chosen Ox, with the entire chain as a unit, 4 spaces. Discard all tiles occupying any spaces the chain moves over. Stop the stampede if the chain is broken. (1)

name: Taunt
description: Choose a Creature neigboring a Monkey you control. Place Taunt under that Creature. For as long as Taunt is under the Creature, it has half its INT value. Discard Taunt if/when the Creature no longer neighbors the Monkey.

name: Time Alone
description: Remove a Dragon you control from the game. For the rest of the game, as an Action, you may bring the removed Dragon back into the game and place it in an empty space neigboring an Item or Obstacle. (2)

name: Upset Whelp
description: Once per turn as Reaction, any opponent(s) may give a gile neigboring this one -2 STR until end of turn. If all spaces neigboring this tile contain Dragons, place this tile and all neigboring Dragons into your Point Pile. (1)

name: Wingspan
description: On the left and right neighbor spaces of a Dragon you control, move Creatures you do not control back from the dragon 1 space into an empty space. Capture any Creatures that can not do this. (1)
